title: Group of 11 nominees NOT sent to President
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The names nominated during Wednesday’s (11) meeting by Group of 11 parties for the post of new Prime Minister, have not be sent to the President, said Former President Maithripala Sirisena.
The Group of 11 parties had proposed Nimal Siripala De Silva, Dullas Alahapperuma, and President’s Counsel Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe for the post of Prime Minister.
The Group of 11 parties and the Independent MPs in Parliament met on Wednesday (11) in Colombo.
North Korea Confirms 1st Covid Case, Declares “Severe National Emergency”
